extendedInfo.description: Droid NAS allows you to share folders over a Wi-Fi network, making your Android device visible as a Bonjour computer in Finder on your Mac. Turn your phone or tablet into a wireless flash drive with a single tap!Different profiles can be used to quickly choose which folders to share. Assign your home or office Wi-Fi networks to profiles and Droid NAS will auto-select profiles on start.You can additionally share any folder on your device (including external SD cards) or remove unnecessary shares. Just tap and hold on the list of shares.Supported systems:- Mac OS X.- Android: apps like ES File Explorer, Solid Explorer, GTVBox Video Player.  - Windows is NOT supported because it can't connect to SMB servers via a non-standard port. - Linux most probably also won't work. Keywords: SMB, CIFS, Server, file, transfer, download, upload, copy.

reviews.comment: I love this app. Simple, well designed and really practical. I use it all the time I want to share files between my HTC One and my Mac.
reviews.author: Cristiano D\'andrea

reviews.title: Great, but no ext SD
reviews.comment: Galaxy Note II, can\'t see external SD card. Can this be added?  If so, 5 stars and I would pay for it.
reviews.author: Bob Cook

reviews.title: Indispensible.
reviews.comment: I like using custom ROMs but prefer to surf and download them with my Mac.  Then I use this to transfer them to my phone... OK external SD not visible in the current version at the time of writing but I just use one of the many android file explorers to move them over, no hassle.  Also a great way to transfer photos, videos and music... absolutely brilliant.
reviews.author: Chas Newport

reviews.title: Almost perfect, needs start at launch
reviews.comment: I love this app, although I had to read to figure out how to add custom locations (should just add a button). My only qualm is that it does not have the ability to automatically start the server when the device restarts. Add this one feature and I\'ll give you 5 stars!!!
reviews.author: Dean Sofer

reviews.title: Love it..Awesome
reviews.comment: This is what I\'ve been exactly looking for its really an amazing find. Still would have an option to access external SD for phones with internal SD. Respect devs!!
reviews.author: Subbiah Palani

reviews.title: Nice and Simple
reviews.comment: Works very well. Nice and simple. Wishlist- Nicer layout for android TV -Sharing external HDD.
reviews.author: Gerard Bolger

reviews.title: Just the app I was looking for.....
reviews.comment: Great app...no more search for my sync cable. Now I just touch a button and BAM! I\'m connected and can push my files, or even just clean up some space.
reviews.author: Robert Proffitt

reviews.title: Works very well
reviews.comment: I like being able to easily copy and manage file with this. It does not need a internet connection as when I use dropbox.
reviews.author: Eric Leventhal Arthen

reviews.title: Does not work with Media Center
reviews.comment: I wanted to use this with a Media Center but could not select my external hard drive. If I could do this it would be this app amazing!!!
reviews.author: Jeremy Crocker

reviews.comment: Easy to setup and a joy to use. A must-have!
reviews.author: Lou Marciano

reviews.title: Wont work with Windows,even when you have Bonjour.
reviews.comment: I have the latest Apple Bonjour on my Windows 7 laptop...  It still wont work. ><  Really weird choice to make a Android app only on Apple devices availible. =P
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great program!
reviews.comment: While this is a very useful app, it doesn\'t allow access to the external SD card. Otherwise, great execution!
reviews.author: Mark Pederson

reviews.title: Works perfectly
reviews.comment: If you have a Mac, this is the only file management tool you will ever need. Easier than AirDroid, tablet-compatible, no third party log-ins involved, just pure and simple wireless file management from right within Finder (unlike when using crappy Android File Transfer). Do yourself a favor and skip AirDroid if all you want to do is transfer files to/from a Mac over a local network. A true hidden gem of an app.
reviews.author: Michael Klein

reviews.title: Slick and quick new facility
reviews.comment: I can access my HTC One SV\'s external SD at SD Card/ext_sd/. All this app needs apart from startup status is free choice of folders to share. It doesn\'t see my music or camera folders so it would be better to let me choose them myself.
reviews.author: Steve Rogers

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: So much easier than dealing with buggy Android File Transfer and cables when transferring files between Android and Mac OS X.
reviews.author: Kurt Kaufman

reviews.title: Great but hopefully gets better
reviews.comment: I have had intermittent connection problems but nothing severe. Still hunting down minor issues. One detail change might be nice...  Get rid of the horrible bg... makes it much to hard to red the switch state of various settings--basic black would better than that ... but tank a for the work so far and stick with it.
reviews.author: J.C. Hendee

reviews.title: Good app - some confusing aspects
reviews.comment: This is a great app, very easy to setup and use. I had some difficulty setting it up on my work network, but on my home wireless worked great.  The one area of major confusion I had was that when I clicked on \"SD card\" in Finder, I wasn\'t really seeing everything that was on my SD card. That might be a quirk of the Samsung Galaxy S4, but I had to install a file viewer app on my phone to see what was going on. There is \"emulated\" storage that I was seeing on my mac via Droid NAS, but I wasn\'t really seeing the actual SD card.
reviews.author: Christy Zurcher

reviews.title: Easy to use,  sorely limited
reviews.comment: It\'s easy to use.  Relatively intuitive.  The limitation of internal sdcard access via network and no ms windows access isn\'t a good move. Luckily I have a MBP and it works great,  but I would prefer access for Windows as well.
reviews.author: avery brandt

reviews.title: Great app,
reviews.comment: Its a great and very useful app, but you cannot access the external sd card of your device, if this feature is added it would be just perfect for mac users
reviews.author: Dario Ferrer

reviews.title: Simply the best!!!!
reviews.comment: Superb file transfer app.. Very easy to use and transfer files between my mac and nexus 4...
reviews.author: Rohan k
